## ğŸ§¾ **SECTION 3: Split & Format Each Review**

ğŸ§© **Node:**

* ğŸ§¾ `Split & Format Each Review`

---

### ğŸ§  Whatâ€™s Happening:

This Code Node takes the array of product reviews and **splits them into one item each**.

#### Code Features:

* Converts relative URLs to full links (e.g., `/xyz` â†’ `https://www.theverge.com/xyz`)
* Outputs 10 clean JSON objects, one per review.

```javascript
return items.map(review => {
  return {
    json: {
      title: review.title,
      url: "https://www.theverge.com" + review.url,
      release_date: review.release_date,
      summary: review.summary
    }
  };
});
```

---

### ğŸ’¡ Why it matters:

This lets you send **individual emails** and store **individual entries** â€” great for reporting, filtering, and team alerts.
